verbs.description: BERLIN ( AP ) - After [ARGM-MNR: wrongly] [V: stating] [ARGM-TMP: a day earlier] [ARG1: that crime in Germany is surging] , U.S. President Donald Trump is singling out the European nation again to warn about the alleged danger posed by migrants .
